question: Can men have a vasectomy? What is the ruling on wearing the trousers above the ancles? Jazzakallah
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It will not be permissible for men to have vasectomy. A vasectomy is tantamount to permanent birth control which is not permissible. Moreover, it is also tantamount to ?change in the creation? which is prohibited in the Qur?aan. ?And I (Shaytaan) will order them to deface the nature created by Allah.? (Contemporary Medical Issues in Islamic Jurisprudence pgs.185-186)

The ruling of wearing the trousers above the ankles is Waajib (compulsory). It comes in a Hdith that whatever is below the ankles will be in the fire of hell.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
